title: Design for Covered Bowl
description: covered bowl with three feet; image of pine boughs on cover highlighted in light blue, green, and orange-yellow watercolor; bottom part of bowl has images of pine boughs, green, rocky landscape, and winding blue stream; also highlighted in blue, green, and orange-yellow
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
